data.title: A Main Paint Shells + Fade Seize Combo
data.description: Use this early round A Main Paint Shells + Seize combo to get picks early in the round by catching enemy players who attempt to push through A Main quickly off guard, while also creating a window of opportunity that your team can use to gain an advantage when contesting A Main.

data.title: Delay C Site Push with These Paint Shells Lineups when Rotating
data.description: Use these Paint Shells lineups to delay the C Site Push when you are rotating through C Waterfall or C Hall from somewhere else on the map.

data.title: Early Round A Main Paint Shells to Contest Space
data.description: Throw Paint Shells in front of the Attacker A Lobby spawn barrier to contest space in A Main.
